TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewHeaderRowPresenter extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.GridViewRowPresenterBase

summary.span: 表示定义列标题的行布局所用的对象。

span.span: Represents an object that is used to define the layout of a row of column headers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 对象和 对象是用于在的 列中显示数据的模式的对象 。This object and objects are support objects for the mode that displays data in columns for a . 有关如何定义视图的详细信息 ，请参阅 [GridView 概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-overview)。For more information about how to define a view, see the [GridView Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-overview). 您可以通过监视为定义的事件来确定列何时移动到新位置 。You can determine when a column is moving to a new location by monitoring the event that is defined for the . 您可以 使用在此类和相关类中找到的各种属性，在视图模式下自定义列标题。You can customize column headers in a view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes. 有关这些属性以及这些属性之间优先级的详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview)。For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置用于列标题的 。

The to use for the column header container.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将此类作为视图模式的一部分实现时 ，此属性的值将绑定到上的属性的值 。When you implement this class as part of a view mode, the value of this property is bound to the value of the property on the . 您可以 使用在此类和相关类中找到的各种属性，在视图模式下自定义列标题。You can customize column headers in a view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes. 有关这些属性以及这些属性之间优先级的详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview)。For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview). 设置样式时，某些限制适用。When you set styles, some restrictions apply. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [样式设置和模板化](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating)。For more information, see the [Styling and Templating](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource` 、或 `DynamicResource` 。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅 [XAML 资源](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources)。See [XAML Resources](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources). *StyleResourceKey**StyleResourceKey* 标识所请求的样式的键。The key that identifies the style being requested. 键引用中的现有资源 。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 属性元素语法在技术上是可行的，但不建议这样做。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 请参阅 [内联样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates). 使用或的绑定引用也是可能的，但情况并不常见。A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置一个撰写字符串，该字符串指定如果列标题显示为字符串，应如何设置这些列标题的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the column headers if they are displayed as strings.

value.span: 一个撰写字符串，指定如果列标题显示为字符串，应如何设置这些列标题的格式。

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the column headers if they are displayed as strings.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 设置了、 或 属性，则忽略此属性。If the , , or property is set, this property is ignored. 您可以使用多个属性来指定列标题的格式。You can use several properties to specify the format of the column headers. 如果设置了多个属性，则将列标题的格式设置为具有最高优先级的属性的值。If more than one property is set, the column header is formatted with the value of the property that has the highest priority. 可以在多种类型上设置列的格式。The format for a column can be set on several types. 以下列表显示了可用于设置列标题格式的属性，按从低到高的优先级按顺序排列：The following list shows the properties that can be used to format the column headers, ordered from lowest to highest priority: - - - ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将此类作为视图模式的一部分实现时 ，此属性的值将绑定到上的属性的值 。When you implement this class as part of a view mode, the value of this property is bound to the value of the property on the . 如果 同时设置了属性和 属性，将 优先使用。If the property and the property are both set, the takes precedence. 您可以 使用在此类和相关类中找到的各种属性，在视图模式下自定义列标题。You can customize column headers in a view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes. 有关这些属性以及这些属性之间优先级的详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview)。For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource` 、或 `DynamicResource` 。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅 [XAML 资源](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources)。See [XAML Resources](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources). *TemplateResourceKey**TemplateResourceKey* 标识所请求的模板的键。The key that identifies the template being requested. 键引用中的现有资源 。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 属性元素语法在技术上是可行的，但不建议这样做。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 请参阅 [内联样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates). 使用或的绑定引用也是可能的，但情况并不常见。A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 同时设置了属性和 属性，将 优先使用。If the property and the property are both set, the takes precedence. 在将此类作为视图模式的一部分实现时 ，此属性的值将绑定到上的属性的值 。When you implement this class as part of a view mode, the value of this property is bound to the value of the property on the . 您可以 使用在此类和相关类中找到的各种属性，在视图模式下自定义列标题。You can customize column headers in a view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes. 有关这些属性以及这些属性之间优先级的详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview)。For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation**MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* 一个派生自 的类，它实现实际 重写。A class derived from that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅 [WPF xaml 的 XAML 命名空间和命名空间映射](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml). *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource` 、或 `DynamicResource` 。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅 [XAML 资源](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources)。See [XAML Resources](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources). *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey**DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* 标识所请求的选择器实现的键。The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested. 该键引用实现实际重写的派生类 。The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅 [WPF xaml 的 XAML 命名空间和命名空间映射](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml). 还可以通过编程方式将类的实例 作为资源添加到资源字典。You can also programmatically add an instance of your class as a resource to a resource dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将此类作为视图模式的一部分实现时 ，此属性的值将绑定到上的属性的值 。When you implement this class as part of a view mode, the value of this property is bound to the value of the property on the . 您可以 使用在此类和相关类中找到的各种属性，在视图模式下自定义列标题。You can customize column headers in a view mode by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes. 有关这些属性以及这些属性之间优先级的详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview)。For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `toolTipContent` 一个字符串，该字符串将成为的显示文本 。A string that becomes the display text for the . `toolTipObjectContent` 要用作工具提示的内容的对象。An object to use as the content for the tooltip. 通常，此对象是一个 或一些其他元素，用于定义的布局 ，如文本元素。Typically, this object is a or some other element that defines a layout for the , such as a text element. 在这种用法中，将 从分析的 XAML 隐式创建一个元素，并将 `toolTipObjectContent` 内容设置为其 属性。In this usage, a element is implicitly created from the parsed XAML, and the `toolTipObjectContent` content is set as its property. <`ToolTip` .../><`ToolTip` .../> 请参阅 。See . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnLostMouseCapture(class System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnLostMouseCapture (e As MouseEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供用于 的 事件的类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在 列移动到新位置时发生事件，则取消移动。If a event occurs while a column is moving to a new position, the move is canceled. 此实现不处理 事件。This implementation does not handle the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseLeftButtonDown(class System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseLeftButtonDown (e As MouseButtonEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供用于当用户在 内按下鼠标左键时发生的 事件的类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event that occurs when the user presses the left mouse button inside a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为 `true` ，则此方法准备要拖动到列标题行中的另一个位置的列。If is `true`, this method prepares a column to be dragged to another location in the column header row. 此实现 通过将 事件参数设置为来处理事件 `true` 。This implementation handles the event by setting the event argument to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseLeftButtonUp(class System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseLeftButtonUp (e As MouseButtonEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供用于当用户释放鼠标左键时发生的 事件的类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event that occurs when the user releases the left mouse button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为 `true` ，并且在将 列拖动到新位置之后发生事件，则移动列。If is `true`, and if the event occurs after a column is dragged to a new location, the column is moved. 此实现 通过将 事件参数设置为来处理事件 `true` 。This implementation handles the event by setting the event argument to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseMove(class System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseMove (e As MouseEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供用于当用户移动鼠标时发生的 事件的类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event that occurs when the user moves the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 属性设置为 `true` ，并且用户按下鼠标左键，则此方法将实现在用户将拖动到新位置时发生的视觉行为 。If the property is set to `true` and the user presses the left mouse button, this method implements the visual behavior that occurs when the user drags a to a new location. `true` 即使用户没有按下鼠标左键，此方法重写也会将事件的事件参数设置为。This method override sets the event argument to `true` for the event even if the user does not press the left mouse button.
